name: Sableye
author: Yukiko Baba
flavor_text: This Pokémon is feared. When its gemstone eyes begin to glow with a sinister shine, it’s believed that Sableye will steal people’s spirits away.

abilities.name: Excavate
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top card of your deck. You may discard that card.

attacks.name: Disable
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Active Pokémon’s attacks. That Pokémon can’t use that attack during your opponent’s next turn.
